title: A Complete Guide to the Best Colors for All 12 Zodiac Signs

steps.title: Aries (March 21-April 19): Red
steps.content: Aries (March 21-April 19): Red For bold and assertive Aries, there’s no other color this sign can be other than red! The color red symbolizes passion, energy, power, and confidence, which Aries has no shortage of. As a fire sign ruled by Mars, the red planet of action and desire, this blazing hue helps Aries feel grounded, motivated to seek new adventures, and brave enough to face challenges head-on. [1] X Research source Other lucky colors for Aries : Orange, yellow, and pink Red is also associated with the root chakra , which deals with power and action. Surrounding themself with red can help Aries feel grounded, confident, and secure.

steps.title: Taurus (April 20-May 20): Forest green
steps.content: Taurus (April 20-May 20): Forest green Earthy and sensual Taurus feels most like themself when surrounded by deep shades of green. These lush and relaxing hues embody Taurus’ grounded and practical nature, stable and patient presence, and desire for the finer things in life. Green also symbolizes growth and money, helping Taurus stay determined to reach all the success they aspire to. [2] X Research source Other lucky colors for Taurus : Pink, black, and white Green is related to the heart chakra , which is associated with love and empathy. So, wearing green can help Taurus get in touch with their emotions and feel the world around them.

steps.title: Gemini (May 21-June 21): Yellow
steps.content: Gemini (May 21-June 21): Yellow As an intellectual and energetic air sign, yellow captures Gemini’s dual natures. The color yellow is associated with knowledge and communication, speaking to Mercury-ruled Gemini’s curiosity, love of learning, and chatterbox tendencies. Yellow is also a cheery and positive color, helping Gemini tap into their witty, friendly, and warm personality. [3] X Research source Other lucky colors for Gemini : Orange, green, and blue Yellow is associated with the solar plexus chakra , which influences confidence. By wearing yellow, Gemini can feel more self-assured and motivated.

steps.title: Cancer (June 22-July 22): Silver
steps.content: Cancer (June 22-July 22): Silver Cancer is silver personified. Ruled by the shining and mystical moon, silver strengthens Cancer’s deep intuition and empathetic heart. This shade is also calming and grounding for this sensitive water sign, helping them feel emotionally balanced. Silver has an air of magic and inspiration, too, getting Cancer in touch with their creative side. [4] X Research source Other lucky colors for Cancer : White, blue, seafoam green

steps.title: Leo (July 23-August 22): Orange
steps.content: Leo (July 23-August 22): Orange Leo needs a color that’s just as warm, passionate, and attention-grabbing as them, and orange fits the bill! Orange mirrors the sun, which is Leo’s ruler, amplifying this sign’s unwavering confidence, magnetic charm, and ambitious spirit. This enthusiastic shade also embodies Leo’s outgoing, friendly, and generous personality. [5] X Research source Other lucky colors for Leo : Gold, yellow, and purple Orange is related to the sacral chakra , which relates to your emotions and creativity. Surrounding themself with orange can also help Leo feel balanced and inspired.

steps.title: Virgo (August 23-September 22): Brown
steps.content: Virgo (August 23-September 22): Brown Neutral brown shades like deep chocolates, rich caramels, and soft taupes perfectly fit Virgo’s minimalistic and clean aesthetic. These subdued colors help this earth sign feel more grounded and calm as they’re hard at work. Shades of brown also speak to Virgo’s practical and logical nature, helping them cut through unnecessary noise to get to what matters. [6] X Research source Other lucky colors for Virgo : Green, blue, and white

steps.title: Libra (September 23-October 22): Pink
steps.content: Libra (September 23-October 22): Pink With Venus, the planet of love and beauty, as Libra’s ruler, it’s no surprise that pink is their power color. The color pink boosts Libra’s charming and friendly presence, amplifies their compassionate spirit, and of course, makes this hopeless romantic even more passionate and flirtatious. Pink is also balancing for this justice-minded sign, helping them find peace and unity in their personal and professional lives. [7] X Research source Other lucky colors for Libra : Blue, white, and green

steps.title: Scorpio (October 23-November 21): Black
steps.content: Scorpio (October 23-November 21): Black Black is associated with power, transformation, and the unknown, perfectly matching Scorpio’s intensity and mysterious aura. With Pluto as their ruler, black fuels Scorpio’s passion and ambition so they get to the top of whatever mountain they’re climbing. This color also helps Scorpio get in touch with their intuition and creative juices to better express themself. [8] X Research source Other lucky colors for Scorpio : Red, blue, and purple

steps.title: Sagittarius (November 22-December 21): Purple
steps.content: Sagittarius (November 22-December 21): Purple Purple is a deep and vibrant color that helps fiery Sagittarius expand their mind and horizons. This lively hue matches Sag’s adventurous spirit, giving them the energy to explore new places, try new things, and meet new people. Purple is also associated with wisdom and mysticism, speaking to Sag’s philosophical mind. It helps fuel their curiosity and find unexplored truths. [9] X Research source Other lucky colors for Sagittarius : Orange, yellow, and pink Purple and indigo are associated with the third eye chakra , which relates to intuition and spirituality. Wearing purple can help Sag feel more aware and aligned with their higher self.

steps.title: Capricorn (December 22-January 19): Gray
steps.content: Capricorn (December 22-January 19): Gray Capricorn is deeply influenced by their ruler Saturn, giving them a structured, disciplined, and responsible approach to life. So, it’s no wonder that gray is the color for them! This powerful shade belongs in the C-suite, helping ambitious Capricorn work hard and achieve their dream of being CEO. Gray is also practical and grounded, helping Cap stay calm and motivated as they climb toward their dreams. [10] X Research source Other lucky colors for Capricorn : Brown, green, and navy blue

steps.title: Aquarius (January 20-February 18): Blue
steps.content: Aquarius (January 20-February 18): Blue Vivid blues perfectly capture Aquarius’ brainy and quirky vibe. The color blue has long been associated with wisdom, creativity, and the open skies, sharpening Aquarius’ analytical skills and helping them open up their mind and let their uniqueness shine. Blue also mirrors the color of Aqua’s ruling planet, Uranus, fueling their innovative and imaginative spirit. [11] X Research source Other lucky colors for Aquarius : Turquoise, white, and purple Blue is related to the throat chakra , which deals with communication. Surrounding themself with blue can help Aquarius express themself and feel more balanced.

steps.title: Pisces (February 19-March 20): Seafoam green
steps.content: Pisces (February 19-March 20): Seafoam green The fish of the zodiac feels most at home in seafoam green, which may come as no surprise! This ocean-like shade matches the sensitive and go-with-the-flow vibe that Pisces exudes, helping them feel in control of their emotions and at peace. Seafoam green also has an ethereal vibe that’s in tune with this water sign’s dreamy nature, boosting their creativity. [12] X Research source Other lucky colors for Pisces : Blue, pink, and yellow

steps.title: Wear clothes, accessories, and makeup in your sign’s color.
steps.content: Wear clothes, accessories, and makeup in your sign’s color. One of the best ways to strengthen your sign’s traits, feel balanced, and improve your luck is to incorporate your sign’s colors in your wardrobe. For instance, wear shirts, pants, dresses, shoes, bags, jewelry, and hats in your color. Or, put on lipstick, eyeshadow, eyeliner, and nail polish in your sign’s color. For instance, if you’re an Aries, make a red handbag and a bold red lip part of your everyday look. Or, if you’re a Virgo, wear monochromatic fits in shades of brown.

steps.title: Decorate your space with furniture and decor in your color.
steps.content: Decorate your space with furniture and decor in your color. Add your sign’s color to your living and working space, too. For example, get an accent chair in your color or add pops of your color in pillows, blankets, rugs, and curtains. Smaller decorations are a great way to incorporate your color, too, like artwork, picture frames, and vases. Consider painting all of your walls or an accent wall your color. This can help tie in other decorations in your color, too.

steps.title: Use or wear crystals in your zodiac sign’s color.
steps.content: Use or wear crystals in your zodiac sign’s color. Crystals are also believed to help amplify your sign’s traits. For instance, wear crystal jewelry in your sign's color or carry a gemstone around with you. Or, decorate your space with crystals in your sign’s color. You can also use them in your spiritual practice , like holding a crystal as you meditate. Some great crystals for each sign include: [13] X Research source Aries : Red coral, red jasper, and ruby Taurus : Emerald, moss agate, and green aventurine Gemini : Citrine, tiger’s eye, and amber Cancer : Pearl, moonstone, and clear quartz Leo : Sunstone, amber, and orange jasper Virgo : Smokey quartz, brown jasper, and sardonyx Libra : Rose quartz, rhodonite, and pink opal Scorpio : Obsidian, black tourmaline, and melanite (black garnet) Sagittarius : Amethyst, tanzanite, and purpurite Capricorn : Shungite, tenorite, and franklinite Aquarius : Blue sapphire, aquamarine, and blue agate Pisces : Aquamarine, turquoise, and larimar

steps.title: Every zodiac sign has its own birthstone.
steps.content: Every zodiac sign has its own birthstone. Birthstones are unique gems that are tied to the month you were born in. The zodiac signs are associated with 2 birthstones, since each sign spans across 2 months. While the birthstone for your sign might not match up with its color, it’s still a great way to amplify your sign’s traits and bring good luck. Here are the birthstones for each sign: [14] X Trustworthy Source Gemological Institute of America Nonprofit institute responsible for gemological research and education and setting gemstone buying and selling standards Go to source Aries : Bloodstone (March) and Diamond (April) Taurus : Diamond (April) and Emerald (May) Gemini : Emerald (May) and Pearl (June) Cancer : Pearl (June) and Ruby (July) Leo : Ruby (July) and Peridot (August) Virgo : Peridot (August) and Sapphire (September) Libra : Sapphire (September) and Opal (October) Scorpio : Opal (October) and Topaz (November) Sagittarius : Topaz (November) and Turquoise (December) Capricorn : Turquoise (December) and Garnet (January) Aquarius : Garnet (January) and Amethyst (February) Pisces : Amethyst (February) and Bloodstone (March)
